logic

Class DLX

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.DLX

  • public class DLX
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods to implement the Dancing Links algorithm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DLX()
      Creates the root node and sets total solutions to zero
